Grand Mosque

Al Jazeera reported that on August 28, 2011, security forces bombarded the minaret of the Grand Mosque in Abu Kamal.

Date: August 28, 2011

Khaled bin Walid Mosque

Trend News Agency reported that on Wednesday August 7, 2011 Syrian security forces swept through Homs and fired at the Khaled bin Walid Mosque. Six people were killed in the attacks.

Date: August 31, 2011

Tawhid Mosque

Xinhua News Agency reported that on September 30, 2011 an explosive device planted by a mosque in Douma was dismantled. Three explosive experts were killed during the process.

Date: September 30, 2011

Statue of President Hafez al-Assad

Pretoria News reported that on October 10, 2011, protestors tore down a statue of Hafez Assad in Qamlishi. Protestors were primarily Kurdish. Hafez Assad is the late father of Bashar al-Assad.

Date: October 8, 2011

The Omari Mosque

BBC Monitoring Middle East reported that on October 15, 2011 armed terrorist groups planted three explosive devices intended to cause damage to Al Omari mosque in Daraa.

Date: October 15, 2011
